props.title: Average percentage of time the CPU is used by user processes
props.query: SELECT average(`f5.system.cpuUserUtilization`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Average percentage of time the CPU is used by the kernel
props.query: SELECT average(`f5.system.cpuSystemUtilization`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Average percentage of time the CPU is idle
props.query: SELECT average(`f5.system.cpuIdleUtilization`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Total amount of memory used in bytes
props.query: SELECT average(`f5.system.memoryUsedInBytes`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Swap space used in bytes
props.query: SELECT average(`f5.system.swapUsedInBytes`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto
